<!-- style | custom css | theme options -->
<style>
h1 { font-weight: 400; }
h2 { font-weight: 400; letter-spacing: 1px; }
h3 { font-weight: 400; }
h4 { font-weight: 700; }
h5 { font-weight: 700; letter-spacing: 2px; }
h6 { font-weight: 700; }

#Top_bar #logo {
          height: 70px;
          padding: 10px 0px;
}
#Content {
    z-index: 100;
}
/* Header */
.header-classic #Top_bar { border-bottom: 1px solid #e1e1e1; }
#Top_bar.is-sticky{    z-index: 9999 !important;}
#Top_bar.is-sticky #logo img {
    max-height: 48px;
    width: auto !important;

}
#Top_bar.is-sticky #logo {
    height: 50px;
    line-height: 50px;
    padding: 0;
}
#Content {
    min-height: 250px;
    padding-top: 30px;
    width: 100%;
}
.current-menu-item{ background: #004e89 !important; color:#fff !important;}
.current-menu-item a{ color:#fff!important; }
.transparent {opacity: 0.73;}

/* Menu */
#Top_bar .menu > li > a:after { bottom: 0 !important; height: 10px; left: 50%; top: auto; width: 1px; }
#Top_bar .menu > li > a span:not(.description) { letter-spacing: 1px; }

.column_map .google-map-contact-wrapper .get_in_touch {
    float: right;
    padding: 25px;
    position: relative;
    width: 255px;
}

/* Action bar */
#Action_bar a { color: #ccc; }

/* Widget */
.widget-area:before { display: none; }
.aside_left .widget-area { border: 0; }
.widget { padding-bottom: 0; }
.widget:after { border: 0; }

/* Icon box */
.icon_box { background: #fff; border: 1px solid #004e89; margin-bottom: 50px; }
.icon_box .image_wrapper { margin-top: -45px; }
.icon_box .desc { margin: 0 8%; }
.icon_box .desc a.button { margin-bottom: -39px; }

/* Offer box */

<script>
//<![CDATA[
jQuery(document).ready(function($) {
	$('#purchase_type').change(function() {
		if($(this).val() == 'Purchase w Financing') {
			$('.sales_price').show();
			$('.loan_amount').show();
			$('.face_value').hide();
		}
		if($(this).val() == 'Cash Purchase') {
			$('.sales_price').show();
			$('.loan_amount').hide();
			$('.face_value').hide();
		}
		if($(this).val() == 'Refinance') {
			$('.sales_price').hide();
			$('.loan_amount').show();
			$('.face_value').show();
		}
	});
});
//]]>
</script>
